name: District Westhope
description:
District Westhope

The zombies have taken over the world and eaten all the selenium from humans, but your soul is the only one that still exists.

Disable all terminals to escape the world and win the game. to diable it you need to go next to the Terminal and point with the cursor on it, and click. In the world are 5 terminals but each terminal you disable more enemys spawn. If a enemy catches you then you then your dead. If you disable all terminals you need to find the exit door and escape.
